page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN TARBERT,HARRIS
page.content: In the area there are 108 households in which 280 people live,they are split into the following age groups,under-five:15;five to eleven:22 ;twelve to eighteen:38;adults under sixty:142;and adults over sixty:63. In Harris there is a high rate of unemployment and our statistics agree with this.We found that in Tarbert there are 68-2% of adult males in work and 31-8% unemployed.For adult females 56-5% have a job and 43-5% are unemployed.Among the males who have a job 6-3% were crofters who also did weaving.Tourists play an important part in the employment statistics for Tarbert.Of the adult females that have a job 7-7% are sesonal jobs related to tourism.The major employer is the council who employs about 25% of those in work.
